traits.name: Legendary Resistance (2/Day)
entries: If the maw of Sekolah fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Water Breathing
entries: The maw of Sekolah can breathe only underwater.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The maw of Sekolah makes one attack with its bite and one attack with its tail smash.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 16 (2d10 + 5 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Tail Smash
entries: Melee atk +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 9 (1d8 + 5 damage) bludgeoning damage.

legendary.name: Detect
entries: The maw of Sekolah makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.

legendary.name: Speed of Sekolah
entries: The maw of Sekolah moves up to its speed.

legendary.name: Feed (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The ferocious spirit of Sekolah flashes through the water, tearing through the foes of the maw of Sekolah. Each creature of the maw's choosing within 60 feet of it must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
